      • randBoolean

        boolean randBoolean()
        Returns:
        the boolean values "true" or "false" with equal probability

      • randBoolean

        boolean randBoolean(double p)
        Parameters:
        p - the desired probability for returning the boolean value "true"
        Returns:
        the boolean value "true" with probability p (and the value "false" with probability 1 - p)
